name: Noodle Drop
description:
Are you hungry? It's time to solve the puzzle and make a bowl of noodles for yourself!

The noodles are dropping from the chopsticks, and the bowl is ready, you just need to find a path and draw a line to let the noodles drop into the bowl!

Yummy, hope you'll enjoy and try collecting as many 3-Stars as you can!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction.
* Now try to get more Perfects and clear all levels.
